mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO enquiry (enquiry_id, quotations_id, supplier, supplierid, flag, amount, quotedprice, exchangerate, tariffrate, addtax, drawback, profitpoint, salesquotation, iso, process, antecedents, doc, productstatus,note,status,createon,createby,modifyon,modifyby,owner) values
(#{item.enquiry_id}, #{item.quotations_id}, #{item.supplier}, #{item.supplierid}, #{item.flag}, #{item.amount}, #{item.quotedprice}, #{item.exchangerate}, #{item.tariffrate}, #{item.addtax}, #{item.drawback}, #{item.profitpoint}, #{item.salesquotation}, #{item.iso}, #{item.process}, #{item.antecedents}, #{item.doc}, #{item.productstatus}, #{item.note}, #{item.status}, #{item.createon}, #{item.createby}, #{item.modifyon}, #{item.modifyby}, #{item.owner})
